verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: decided] [ARG1: to postpone a decision on some allies , including the European Union , for 30 days] .

President Donald Trump decided to postpone a decision on [ARG2: some allies] , [V: including] [ARG1: the European Union] , for 30 days .
